Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0633 affecting package iniparser for versions less than 4.1-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0633 affecting package iniparser for versions less than 4.1-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package iniparser is earlier than 4.1-8, affected by CVE-2025-0633
